How can we rephrase the sentiment statement to emphasize the significance of self-care and discourage dwelling on the past, while still conveying a message to live in the moment and appreciate the present beauty? Incorporate the following Latex code to illustrate the concept of letting go and prioritizing personal well-being:
\[ \text{Letting go} + \text{Self-care} = \text{Living in the moment} + \text{Appreciating present beauty} - \text{Dwelling on negative thoughts} \]

Certainly! Here's a rephrased sentiment statement that emphasizes the importance of self-care and encourages living in the present:

"Embrace the art of letting go and prioritize self-care to fully experience the beauty of the present moment. By focusing on your well-being, you free yourself from the weight of past regrets and negative thoughts, allowing you to truly appreciate the world around you. Remember, the equation for a fulfilling life is as follows: 

\[ \text{Letting go} + \text{Self-care} = \text{Living in the moment} + \text{Appreciating present beauty} - \text{Dwelling on negative thoughts} \]

This balance is key to finding peace and happiness in the here and now."
